# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Volume)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VolumePluginInfo.C
VolumeCommonPluginInfo.C
VolumeAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
VolumePluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
VolumeGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisVolumePlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
${SLIVR_GUI_IMPL}
TransferFunctionWidget.C
VolumeRLEFunctions.C
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisVolumePlotWindow.h
${SLIVR_GUI_HDR}
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(GVolumePlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
VolumeViewerPluginInfo.C
avtVolumePlot.C
VolumeFunctions.C
VolumeRLEFunctions.C
avtVolumeRenderer.C
avtVolumeFilter.C
avtLowerResolutionVolumeFilter.C
avtOpenGLSplattingVolumeRenderer.C
avtMesaSplattingVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGL3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C
avtMesa3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGLSLIVRVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGLTuvokVolumeRenderer.C
BoundingBoxContourer.C
TransferFunctionWidget.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VolumeEnginePluginInfo.C
avtVolumePlot.C
VolumeFunctions.C
VolumeRLEFunctions.C
avtVolumeRenderer.C
avtVolumeFilter.C
avtLowerResolutionVolumeFilter.C
avtOpenGLSplattingVolumeRenderer.C
avtMesaSplattingVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGL3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C
avtMesa3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGLSLIVRVolumeRenderer.C
avtOpenGLTuvokVolumeRenderer.C
BoundingBoxContourer.C
TransferFunctionWidget.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

# windows opengl include dirs are part of compiler paths, no need to set separately
IF (NOT WIN32)
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtOpenGL3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C avtOpenGLSLIVRVolumeRenderer.C avtOpenGLSplattingVolumeRenderer.C avtOpenGLTuvokVolumeRenderer.C 
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR}"
    )
ENDIF (NOT WIN32)

# BEGIN Custom code
IF(VISIT_TUVOK)
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtOpenGLTuvokVolumeRenderer.C avtVolumeRenderer.C
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "USE_TUVOK"
    )
ENDIF(VISIT_TUVOK)
IF(VISIT_SLIVR)
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DHAVE_LIBSLIVR -DslivrG_EXPORTS -DslivrV_EXPORTS)
ENDIF(VISIT_SLIVR)
# END Custom code
SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtMesa3DTextureVolumeRenderer.C avtMesaSplattingVolumeRenderer.C 
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${MESA_INCLUDE_DIR}"
)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy ${QT_QTOPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR} ${SLIVR_INCLUDE_DIR} ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIR} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok/tuvok 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok/tuvok/IO/3rdParty/boost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok/tuvok/IO/3rdParty
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok/tuvok/3rdParty
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/third_party_builtin/tuvok/tuvok/3rdParty/boost
)

SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/plots)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MESA_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(IVolumePlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVolumePlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVolumePlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GVolumePlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GVolumePlot visitcommon gui ${TUVOK_LIB} ${QT_QTOPENGL_LIB} ${SLIVR_LIB} ${GLEW_LIB} ${OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY} )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VVolumePlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VVolumePlot visitcommon viewer ${TUVOK_LIB} ${SLIVR_LIB} ${GLEW_LIB} ${OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY} )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GVolumePlot VVolumePlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            VolumeScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyVolumeAttributes.C
            TransferFunctionWidget.C
            PyTransferFunctionWidget.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SVolumePlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SVolumePlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SVolumePlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaVolume ALL ${CMAKE_Java_COMPILER} ${CMAKE_Java_FLAGS} -d ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java -classpath ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java TransferFunctionWidget.java VolumeAttributes.java)
        ADD_DEPENDENCIES(JavaVolume JavaClient)
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVolumePlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVolumePlot_ser visitcommon avtplotter_ser avtpipeline_ser ${TUVOK_LIB} ${SLIVR_LIB} ${GLEW_LIB} ${OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY} )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVolumePlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVolumePlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVolumePlot_par visitcommon avtplotter_par avtpipeline_par ${TUVOK_LIB} ${SLIVR_LIB} ${GLEW_LIB} ${OPENGL_gl_LIBRARY} )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVolumePlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
